description: Manufacture of vaccines at the Commonwealth Serum Laboratories; field stations where animals are kept for the preparation and testing of vaccines; production of penicillin, Salk vaccine and Pulpy Kidney vaccine at the laboratories at Parkville. Over 600 valuable and life-saving products are made to which rigid standards of research and production are applied.
